page.title: 12CHANGING TIMES cont.
page.content: to bring them to Worcester to do the bulk of their shopping.Indeed apart from the few general stores in Kempsey,very few similar shops remain in the area.Most people now have a car and prefer the wide range of goods found in the city centre. At the moment the quiet peacefulness of the Common remains unchanged;yet this could change all too soon,with plans to increase the M5 on this section from 2 to 3 lanes,the Common will inevitably become noisy as the contractors move in to do their essential work.
